segments.text: Looking at this kitchen drawing, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's polishing that plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's running wild, water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or see the mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin everything if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching way too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, egging him on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're all so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
